name: ensaio
description:
With ensa.io you can link colors together, that allows you to update a whole document's color scheme by changing only a single color.


Nice, how does that work?


Easy:

  1. create an account at https://ensa.io (no worries, it's free).
  2. in ensa.io create a theme and add some nice colors to it.
  3. load your theme in Figma and use your colors.


You can learn more about using Figma with ensaio by accessing this page: https://ensa.io/third_party


Ensa.io helps you do so much stuff:


  • keep a color always readable against another.
  • work and convert between RGB, CMYK, HSL, HSV, LAB, XYZ.
  • extract a palette from an image.
  • export a color scheme to ASE and CSS.
  • mix colors.
  • search for color schemes in a range of hues, similarity or simply by its description ex.: "antique light green".
  • discover the work of other people.
